resources.string: You will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.
You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.
Dear patient, all diseases can have a consequence to your treatment. Please fill this questionnaire very carefully. This questionnaire helps us treat you in the very best way.
"Are you taking medication on a regular Basis? If so, wich ones?"
Are you taking any medicine to help make your blood thinner? To block?(i.e. Marcumar, Pradaxa oder Xarelto)? If yes, which ones?
Do you have any allergies, allergic reaction? To certain materials, medicines, aliments?
Do or did you have one of the following diseases? Contagious diseases? (i.e. Tuberculosis, Hepatitis, Aids)?
Do or did you have one of the following diseases? Heart disease? High blood pressure or low blood pressure?
Do or did you have one of the following diseases? Nerve diseases? Spasm attacks? Thyroid diseases? Diabetes? Blood diseases?
For women: Are you pregnant? If so, which month?
